title: We are looking for Split Screen owners to join our club

posts.content:
Hello all,

Please check out Wolfsburg Bus Crew, it's a FREE to join London and surrounding areas based club (but we also have members all around the uk and 1 in Sweden, 1 in South Africa and 1 in Brazil)

https://www.facebook.com/Wolfsburg-Bus- ... 493865688/

It's for owners of Split Screens/early-late-Brazilian Bays and T25s.

We love Split Screens but only have 3 of them in our club and would love to have more!

We have monthly meets, a monthly news letter which offers discounts from VW parts and related companies a club stands at VW shows.

With warm wishes

Wolfsburg Bus Crew

wolfsburgbuscrew.uk
wolfsburgbuscrew@gmail.com
